item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

10/17/2011's location will be:

We have another Brand New Location!

Cave A' Vin

This Wine bar just opened in Mid-September.  Located on Upper State Street (next to C.O.Jones, across from J.P. Dempsey's) Cave A' Vin offers a selection of Wines by the Glass and Craft and Imported Beers by the bottle, to go along with a rotating Cheese List as it's star Menu attraction.  Right now the menu also features a few other light fare "small" plates such as a Hummus dish and Olive platters, however they seem to be experimenting to add some things.  (I put small in quotes as what I got was quite reasonably sized) The decore is mostly a lounge type atmosphere, so if the Bar area isn't your thing then there are some comfy couches.

The Manager Linda will be offering us:

$1 OFF Glasses (of Wine I'm assuming at this point, trying to suggest a Beer Discount)

Some Complementary Sample Cheese Boards will be Served

P.S. As some of you may know, Meetup does charge the Leadership twice a year for hosting the website.  We do not pass this fee along in any mandatory way, however we will take donations at the 10/10, 10/17, and 10/24 Happy Hours.  Anything you can give towards defraying this cost to keeping the group going will be appreciated!  Thanks!

A.J. will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

Please RSVP for this event when able.  For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and we're most likely the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
